capitalize.translation[0].definitions[0]: to write a letter of the alphabet using a capital letter
capitalize.translation[0].definitions[1]: to supply a business with money so that it can operate
capitalize.translation[0].definitions[2]: to calculate the value of a business based on the value of its shares or on the amount of money it makes
capitalize.translation[1].definitions[0]: to make money available to a business in the form of loans and money invested in shares so that it can operate and grow
The company will be capitalized with $80 million in cash from the four partners and about $250 million in debt.
